The work shown can be identified as stylistically similar to the Röttgen Pietà because of which of the following characteristics?
choicesHtml: Sensitively carved naturalistic features that are intended to create a sense of calm devotion in the viewer
Classical proportions and heroic details that serve to enthrone Mary as Queen of Heaven
Physical and emotional suffering of the figures that is depicted to elicit strong feelings from the viewer
A compact pose and realistic figures that reflect representational conventions of the Renaissance
